<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/users/edit"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows you to edit a user's details. This requires admin privileges.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"An object containing the new details.\n","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"userId":{"type":"string","description":"The user ID of the account to modify. \nYou can get the list of user ID by using the `POST /users/get_all/{page}` endpoint.\n"},"newName":{"type":"string","description":"The new name for the user.\n"},"newEmail":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"The new email for the user.\n"},"newAdminStatus":{"type":"boolean","description":"The new admin status for the user. \n- `true`: The user has admin privileges.\n- `false`: The user does not have admin previleges.\n"}},"example":{"userId":"674605a2a18c2f38f2148601","newName":"Jane Doe","newEmail":"jane_example@gmail.com","newAdminStatus":true}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response. Returns an object containing user information.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"type":"object","description":"The parameters related to the user. This gives information about the user.\n","properties":{"_id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the user.\n"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the user.\n"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"The email address of the user.\n"},"password":{"type":"string","description":"The encrypted password of the user.\n"},"admin":{"type":"boolean","description":"The administrtive privilege of the user.\n"},"__v":{"type":"integer","description":"The version of the user. The version increases whenever the account is modified.\n"}}}},"example":{"user":{"_id":"674605a2a18c2f38f2148601","name":"Jane Doe","email":"jane_example@gmail.com","password":"$2a$10$eaixU5.H3PFYW.9V6NM8A.A.CPnFHtbcWPWsp/I1NWsfxqIG6s87K","admin":false,"__v":0}}}}}},"400":{"description":"See message description."},"500":{"description":"see message description."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
